title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 373 - Hazardous Waste Management Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 373 - Hazardous Waste Management Facilities

State Regulations

Subpart 373-1 - Hazardous Waste Treatment, Storage and Disposal Facility Permitting Requirements (§ 373-1.1 to 373-1.12)

Subpart 373-2 - Final Status Standards for Owners and Operators of Hazardous Waste Treatment, Storage and Disposal Facilities (§ 373-2.1 to 373-2.31)

Subpart 373-3 - INTERIM STATUS STANDARDS REGULATIONS FOR OWNERS AND OPERATORS OF HAZARDOUS WASTE FACILITIES (§ 373-3.1 to 373-3.31)

Subpart 373-4 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 373

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, art. 3, § 3-0301, title 3, art. 17, §§ 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0304, 19-0306, 23-2305, 23-2307, 23-2308, art. 27, §§ 27-0105, 27-0106, 27-0305, 27-0905, titles 7, 9, 27-2007, art. 36, §§ 54-0701, 54-0709, 70-0107, 70-0109, 70-0115, art. 71, § 71-2201, titles 27, 35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
